Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: PEDRO ZAPATA RONDON
Reviews.Content: Amazing Phone!!!! If you are thinking change your device, this will be your best choice. Solid Construction and the keyboard its great

Reviews.Title: Best keyboard ever
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Martin Saul
Reviews.Content: The Q10 is the perfect smartphone. The keyboard is excellent, uncomparable. It improves the productivity, it is fast for every application. Solid construction.Ideal for work every day. Also good screen resolution quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Celeste Shi
Reviews.Content: It's my first time using blackberry, and I have to say it's a very nice mobile phone. Just a little bit unaccustomed at first.

Reviews.Title: Better than my other Z10
Reviews.Author: Joel Reymont
Reviews.Content: I own all the iPhone models but for iPhone 5.I also own a Blackberry Bold 9780 and the Z10.I love the Q10 and don't mind the smaller screen.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as i taste!
Reviews.Author: Luis Alejandro Daqui
Reviews.Content: Perfectly for latin-americans and world-wide travelers (model SGN100-2) and for who want to back BB due to connectivity interactions! Camera is not like an Apple or Samsung devices but do it jobs!  No trackball and touchscreen works nice. After a month of usage definitively I approved as a complete Smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievably awful
Reviews.Author: Done with Blackberry
Reviews.Content: This is my last BlackBerry after years of using them. This phone just randomly deleted more than a month's worth of emails, not just from the phone but from the servers. Hopes for recovery are looking quite dim. It's like paying $500 to cut off my own big toe with a hacksaw.

Reviews.Title: freezing
Reviews.Author: Alessandro Jacob
Reviews.Content: terrible product, frreze all the time, blackberry is dead.I tryed 02 of same version, boh freezing and doers not work properly, maybe stores sells deffective models.

Reviews.Title: Great smartphone
Reviews.Author: Antoinette Daniels
Reviews.Content: My biggest plus on this phone is the camera and the speed at which you can switch between one application to the next (once you grasp how to use the phone)

Reviews.Title: Good phone to replace my 9930
Reviews.Author: Marcelo D'Abramo
Reviews.Content: I use BB as a second phone for traveling and working stuff. It's a good phone for working but it doesn't compare to my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: need to answer
Reviews.Author: almaky
Reviews.Content: Hello,i want to ask about this item >>>how long does it take to reach to Elkton,MD in USAand where are you from? I mean does it take so long ?also, does it have Arabic keyboard? or Englishthank you
